code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import Rating from'./Rating';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded",style:{backgroundColor:'#f4f6f6'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{style:{border:'2px ridge #e8daef'},src:product.image,variant:"top"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{style:{backgroundColor:'white'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:`${product.numReviews} reviews`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",children:["\u20B9",product.price]})]})]});};export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( {product.name} â‚¹{product.price} ) } export default Product
